organizations: Center for Science in the Public Interest
lead_paragraph: The consumer advocacy group that sponsored the study accused the N.C.A.A. of not adhering to self-imposed limits on alcohol advertising during the Final Four.
snippet: The consumer advocacy group that sponsored the study accused the N.C.A.A. of not adhering to self-imposed limits on alcohol advertising during the Final Four.
